item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography Hey folks! I am Amrit Singhal. I am a final year undergraduate student in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur. My broad fields of interest are Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Artifical Intelligence. Recently, I have also developed a new found interest towards Neurobiolgy and its computational aspects, and I am currently exploring this area. Apart from the technical aspects, I am also interested towards Sociology in general, and I love to understand how it helps us make sense of our society.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I am a Teaching Assistant in the course ESO207: Data Structures and Algorithms under Prof. Sumit Ganguly, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kanpur. I was an Academic Mentor for the course ESC101: Fundamentals of Computing under Counselling Service, IITK. I was responsible to provide Academic support to freshmen in terms of one-on-one mentoring and institute level remedial classes for concept strengtening, problem solving and revision.
